header.title: 3D Game Generator
header.description: Describe your 3D game idea and we'll generate the code for you using Three.js. Ideal for beginners and advanced developers.

input.title: Describe Your 3D Game
instructions: Describe your 3D game idea in the text area (e.g., "a 3D platformer with jumping character")
Click the Generate button to create your game code
Copy the code and use it with Three.js
Customize the code to fit your exact needs

section.title: How to Use Your Generated Code

steps.title: Create HTML File
steps.description: Create a basic HTML file and include the Three.js library and OrbitControls from a CDN or local installation.

steps.title: Add Your Game Code
steps.description: Copy the generated code into a <script> tag in your HTML file or link to it as an external JS file.

steps.title: Run and Customize
steps.description: Open the HTML file in a web browser to view your game. Modify the code to customize it further.
